entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 this evening then light after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 11 February 2023
